about.subtitle: A sheet metal shop based in Ume√• with extensive experience in the profession as a second generation sheet metal worker as a foundation. A company with high ambitions and visions for the future, where the motivation is to maintain high quality and efficiency. A close-knit team where we work for and with each other to make the customer satisfied.
about.description: After many years active in the industry, Rikard Sv√§rling started RS plate.School by his father then childhood and is now referred to as second -generation sheet metal.We are a young company with lots of experience and ambitions, visions of a bright future.Own complete workshop at V√§stersl√§tt for the manufacture of all material for our various projects.

list.title: Roof Replacement
list.description: We replace your roof! All types of metal roofs including band covering, tile roofs, as well as felt, waterproof roofs. Free quote.

list.title: Gutter
list.description: Gutters, downpipes, and all types of roof drainage.

list.title: Snow Guard
list.description: Snow guards, roof ladders, and all other roof safety, according to industry standards.

list.title: Sheet Metal Work
list.description: Everything from window sills, chimney fittings, to folded metal roofs.

list.title: Roof Felt, Waterproofing Work
list.description: Everything from garage roofs, villas to large industrial properties.

list.title: Manufacturing
list.description: Want to install yourself, no problem we manufacture what you need in our modern sheet metal workshop.

list.title: Roof Snow Removal
list.description: We shovel safely and securely and efficiently everything from villa roofs to large properties.

list.title: Service Work
list.description: Mostly through agreements with property owners, managers, housing associations.

list.title: Roof Maintenance Plan
list.description: We perform roof maintenance plans for large and small property owners.

list.title: Snow removal
list.description: We are shooting your roof!Residential roofs, tenant -owner associations and large property ceiling.Safe and fast!
